word_group.brief_definition: 青少年拘留；少年拘押；少年管教所
拘留中心；关押中心；看守所
临时看守所；临时拘留中心；临时拘留所

bilingual.source: The suspect was held in detention overnight.
He was placed in detention for suspected theft.
bilingual.target: 他因涉嫌盗窃被拘留了。

bilingual.source: The police placed him in detention for questioning.
bilingual.target: 警察为了审问将他拘留了。

bilingual.source: The court ordered his detention until the trial.
bilingual.target: 法院命令在审判前对他进行拘留。

bilingual.source: She was upset about her son's detention at school.
bilingual.target: 她对儿子在学校被拘留感到不安。

bilingual.source: His detention was extended due to new evidence.
bilingual.target: 由于新证据，他的拘留时间被延长了。

bilingual.source: His lawyer is working to shorten his detention period.
bilingual.target: 他的律师正在努力争取他的拘留期缩短。

bilingual.source: The school imposed detention on students who broke the rules.
bilingual.target: 学校对违反纪律的学生实施了拘留。

bilingual.source: She was held in detention by customs at the airport for several hours.
bilingual.target: 她在机场被海关拘留了几个小时。

bilingual.source: Many people were put in detention by the police due to the protests.
bilingual.target: 由于抗议活动，许多人被警方拘留。

yingyinNormal.en: So many new faces in detention today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天的留校来了这么多新面孔。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad, detention was my fault, not hers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，留校是我的错，不是她。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're all the same. Detention, all of you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，你们都一样。你们全体留堂！

yingyinNormal.en: No food fight! Detention this afternoon, both of you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 不准搞食物大战。你们两个，今天下午放学后留校。

yingyinNormal.en: Dad, this is Gabriella Montez. Ah, your detention buddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，这是盖比瑞拉.蒙兹，你留校的伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't make me ask again. Where's Troy and Chad?! Detention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别要我再问一遍。特洛伊和柴德在哪里？！留校。

yingyinNormal.en: Detention him, detention her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他留校，她也得留校。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, guys. Detention over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，各位，留堂结束。

yingyinNormal.en: Then I want detention too. You do? Riley, you've never had detention in your whole life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我也希望被留校。是吗，莱丽？你这辈子都没被留校过。

yingyinNormal.en: What is this place? It's detention, Farkle. It's not for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么地方啊？是留校惩罚，弗科，不是你该来的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Sharpay and Ryan, cell phones. And I will see you in detention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 沙佩，莱恩，手机，我会罚你们留校。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, guys. I like my detention to have a little learning in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，各位，我希望你们能在留校惩罚中学到知识。

yingyinNormal.en: How could you do that, dad? What did I do? You gave them detention together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么可以那样，老爸？我干什么了？你让他们一起留校。

yingyinNormal.en: What could you possibly do that would get you detention on such short notice?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你突然之间，可以做出什么事儿让你被留校？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, detention over, guys. Everyone out. Except Maya. Dad. Everyone out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。留堂结束，大家都出去吧，除了玛雅。爸，所有人都出去。

yingyinNormal.en: So we will see you in detention as well. That's not a possibility, Miss Darbus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你也要留校，不可能，达布丝小姐。

yingyinNormal.en: I will be writing to your families tonight, and you will both receive detention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天晚上我就写信通知你们的家人,还要罚你们两个劳动服务。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Still don't understand this detention thing. It was my fault. Sorry, Dad. Cross court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真不懂为什么要留校？是我的错，对不起，爸爸。走对角线。

yingyinNormal.en: If they have to paint sets for detention, they could do it tonight, not during my practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们若是需要留下来制作道具，那可以今晚再做，不是练习时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, detention may be bringing out the worst in us, but at least we're making the time pass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，留堂让我们表现出了最坏的一面。但至少时间在流逝。
